appName.message: Interactive Dual Subs for Languages Learning

appDescription.message: Supercharge your language skills with instant translations on YouTube, Netflix, Prime, and more. Learn effortlessly while watching!

actionName.message: InterSub: interactive subtitles for video streaming and education platforms

Popup_Auto_pausing_folder_name.description: Settings item text in popup, this item has sub-items

Popup_Auto_pausing_on_cursor_activity.description: Settings item text in popup, after auto pause menu was clicked

Popup_Auto_pausing_on_hovering_subtitles.description: Settings item text in popup, after auto pause menu was clicked. Checks hovering over the entire area of subtitles bar.
Settings item text in popup, after auto pause menu was clicked. Checks hovering over individual translatable words inside interactive part of the subtitles.

Popup_Auto_pausing_Mode_At_the_end_of_cu.description: Text of settings value in popup, after auto pause menu was clicked. If it's selected, pause will happen at the end of the currently displayed subtitle.

Popup_Auto_pausing_Mode_Right_away.description: Text of settings value in popup, after auto pause menu was clicked. If it's selected, pause will happen at the end of the currently displayed subtitle.

Bubble_Auto_pause_enabled_message.message: Auto-pausing on cursor activity is ON. You can switch it off in the settings.

Bubble_Previous_subtitle_hidden_message.message: Showing previous subtitles is disabled. You can always turn it back on in Settings.
Bubble_Previous_subtitle_hidden_message.description: Notification displayed when user clicks cross icon near the previous subtitle

Bubble_Text_too_Long.message: The word or phrase is too long. Try choosing a shorter one.

Onboarding_Plugin_Installed_Congratulati.message: Congratulations on the Installation of InterSub!

Onboarding_Plugin_Installed_Now_you_can_.message: Now you can quickly check unfamiliar words in subtitles on popular video and educational platforms.

Onboarding_Plugin_Installed_A_couple_of_.message: A couple of important steps and you're good to go.

Onboarding_Before_Sample_Video_Now_we_wi.message: In the next step, we'll open a YouTube video and show you how to use InterSub.

Onboarding_Pin_Plugin_Icon_Description.message: This will give you quick access to your recently and most frequently looked-up words, settings, and personal account.

Onboarding_How_to_use_Description_part_1.message: Click the InterSub icon to access Settings.

Onboarding_Language_Selector_Translate_F.message: What language are you learning? We'll show subtitles in this language.

Onboarding_Plugin_Settings_were_reset_Te.message: We need to adjust some settings. A couple of clicks and you're good to go.

Onboarding_We_pause_playback.message: The video pauses when your cursor is over the subtitles for easy lookup.

Onboarding_You_can_disable_auto_pause.message: You can disable auto-pausing or wide background mode in Settings.

Remote_control_QR_code_description.message: Scan with your phone to enable remote control

Remote_control_Stop_remote_control_text.message: Do you want to cancel a remote control session?

Remote_control_closed_note_Description.message: Click on Remote control icon to show QR code again. You can switch Remote control off/on in Settings.

Onboarding_Remote_control_Description.message: Use your smartphone to control video playback and look up words without touching your computer.

Onboarding_Extra_subtitles_Description_1.message: Works for videos when subtitles in both languages are available.

Onboarding_Translate_to_the_same_languag.description: Warning message displayed when user selects same language as native and the one they're studying

Bubble_Loading_subtitles.description: Text displayed while subtitles are being loaded

Bubble_No_double_subtitles.message: This video doesn't have subtitles in $lang$, dual subtitles are not available.
Bubble_No_double_subtitles.description: Text displayed when video has no subtitles in language chosen by the user or when failed to load subtitles in this language, and dual subtitles option is enabled in plugin settings

Bubble_No_subtitles_in_language.message: This video doesn't have subtitles in $lang$.
Bubble_No_subtitles_in_language.description: Text displayed when video has no subtitles in language chosen by the user

Bubble_Extra_subtitles_service_unsupport.message: Dual subtitles are not supported on this site yet. Please, follow the updates.
Bubble_Extra_subtitles_service_unsupport.description: Text displayed when user enabled dual subtitles support wasn't implemented for this service
